name: create-test-app
description: A scaffolding CLI to make your project tested by Jest and with coverage enabled.

scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: npm run jest && npm run test:js && npm run test:ts && npm run test:empty
scripts.test:empty: rm -rf empty-project && mkdir empty-project && cd empty-project && node ../ && cd -
scripts.test:js: cd test/e2e-js && node ../../ --type js --coverage=70 --transform='{ sjs: "babel-jest" }' && npm test && cd -
scripts.test:ts:silent: cd test/e2e-ts && node ../../ --type ts --silent && npm test && cd -
scripts.test:ts: cd test/e2e-ts && node ../../ --type ts && npm test && cd -

author: legend80s
